name: Shopping simulator (IDVeraTak)
description: It is very important that you act as if you were doing grocery shopping in real life. The simulation works based on a drag and drop principles. On the upper right you will see a shopping list with the products you need to get. In the right corner you will have your basket. You can put things in the basket by dragging objects into the basket. If you click on the basket you can see the products you have collected, and you can also remove those by dragging them out of the basket. By clicking again on the basket, you will go back to the shopping shelves. You are also able to shift through shelves by clicking on the arrows. When you have collected all your products, the Finish button will appear. If you are all content with the products you collected, you can click on the Finish button to finish the game. Do mind to pay attention to the end screen and read it.
